name: Soak™ Wool Wash
description:
Available in Minisoak™ 6mL single sachets and 425mL full size bottle, 80+ washes.

MiniSoak™ 6mL single sachets. 
Perfect for sampling a new scent, traveling or gifting.
**Even though this is a single wash sachet, I would normally not use the whole sachet if I'm washing just a few small items. Just a little squirt would probably be sufficient.**

Soak™ Wash is a pure, gentle and deliciously scented way to wash the delicate items you care about most. 

Soak™ is biodegradable, rinse-free, phosphate-free and comes in yummy scents that makes your fibers smell as great as they look. 
Available in Flora, Aquae, Citrus and Scentless.

Perfect for knitters, quilters and fashion lovers alike, the gentle, no-rinse formulation makes keeps your clothes and crafts soft and looking their best. Laundry day has never smelled better! Use Soak on lingerie, swimwear, knits, quilts, workout wear, dance wear and all the stuff you love most!
